Stamford.Pear Tree Point School:
Pear Tree Point School is a co-educational private day school, grades Pre-Kindergarten-Grade 6 in Darien, Connecticut.
It is the only school in the state of Connecticut which officially uses the "Core Knowledge" program. The school keeps its class sizes at a maximum of 15 students. When class size exceeds 10 students a second teaching professional is added. The group sizes for reading and mathematics classes are smaller.
It was founded in 1996.
